titleStmt.title: A caueat for cold Christians. In a sermon preached by Mr. Paul Bayne ... Wherein the common disease of Christians, with the remedie, is plainly and excellently set downe for all that will vse it
titleStmt.author: Baynes, Paul, d. 1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: pImrinted by Felix Kyngston, for Nathanael Newbery, and are to be sold at his shop vnder St. Peters Church in Cornhill, and in Popes-head Alley, right against the signe of the white horse,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Popes-head Alley, right against the signe of the white horse
his shop vnder St. Peters Church in Cornhill
